articles.description: The BYU Cougars women’s basketball team is now ranked No. 19 in The Associated Press Top 25.
articles.content:
The BYU womens basketball team bounced back last week after its first loss of the season, and jumped up a spot in The Associated Press Top 25 poll released Monday as a result.
The Cougars (9-1) are … [+652 chars]

articles.author: Peter Woodburn
articles.title: Gonzaga moves up to No. 4 in latest AP Poll - The Slipper Still Fits
articles.description: A little vote switching goes a long way.
articles.content: After a strong showing against the Texas Tech Red Raiders, the Zags swapped places with the UCLA Bruins to become the newest No. 4 team in the country in the latest AP Poll. Baylor, Duke, and Purdue … [+2999 chars]
